cons:
Clearly under the market standards in terms of salaries

summary: Pros and cons of Ekimo as an Employer
pros: Ekimo fosters an innovative work environment, encouraging employees to take ownership of their projects and contribute to impactful healthcare solutions. The company emphasizes personal and professional growth, offering opportunities for continuous learning and skill development. Additionally, its focus on scalability and digital health positions employees at the forefront of a rapidly growing industry with exciting challenges.
cons: Due to the fast-paced nature of the health-tech industry, employees may face high-pressure situations and tight deadlines, which can sometimes lead to stress. The growing nature of the company can mean that certain roles may lack well-defined processes, leading to ambiguity in responsibilities. Additionally, balancing work across multiple time zones can create challenges in team coordination and communication.

pros: Amazing people, culture and overall a great place to grow. Lots of opportunities!

- Salary is great!
cons: - Feels like whether you are good or not, you will pass probation anyways... there can be more structure to evaluating probation such as seeking both upwards and downwards feedback AND actually taking the feedback into consideration and taking some actions...
